title.rendered: For those of you who never ever went to the school camp, then listen

content.rendered:
The words of Jiho about CGB Camps:

Dear CGB,

For those of you who never ever went to the school camp, then listen, please. Most of you think that camp is boring, frustrating and dirty. I know what I it feels like when you first go to the camp. But I was wrong, I was totally wrong. CGB Camps are so much fun, there is great food, you can hang out with your friends, you do lots of FUN activities and so much more.

I started to go to the camp in year 4. I didn’t want to go camping that time. The reasons I didn’t want to go are because I didn’t have any friends that time, also I didn’t like the forest because I hate insects, and I kind of miss my mom. But when the camp started, I felt like heaven. I didn’t miss my mom, I didn’t even want to say hi to my mom! I made friends and the best thing is: you will sleep in tents!

Now, if your parents don’t trust Zambo (the camping company) tell them to trust you, tell them this: there will be teachers coming to support and take care of you. So, I hope you will change your mind and decide to join the school camp.

Thank you.
